summary: Prerset is for Low-end PC. This preset is using latest ENB binaries and features
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][size=6][b]Ghost ENB
[youtube]zhImexn_SqA[/youtube]
[/b][/size][size=5][i]Ghost ENB is a new WIP preset for low end PC with nice colours and effects.
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61428-1-1420573030.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61428-2-1420573082.jpg[/img]
[b][b][u][size=6]WHAT YOU NEED[/size][/u]

[size=5]Latest ENB files: [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html[/url]
The helper plugin: [url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/[/url]

For ENBSeries to work properly the following values must be set to 1 in SkyrimPrefs.ini:
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

[b]Recomended mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268/?]WATER[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58212/?]Remove Exterior Fog[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD 2k Textures[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers
[/url][/b]THIS ENB IS NOT COMPATIBLE with [u]COT[/u] and other lighting mods.

Credits:
-Boris Vorontsov for ENB
-Kyokushinoyama for best shaders
If I have used anyone's files without crediting you please let me know.[/size][/b][/b]
[/i][/size][/center]
author: Ghost
